testcase.name: Given I am on the main page
When I pick blouse category and pick the item
And I choose quantity and size of the item
And I add the item to cart
Then I check if Total price with shipping is correct

failure.message: Sum of the product price + shipping is not correct.

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: Sum of the product price + shipping is not correct. at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:41) at pl.soflab.PageObjects.ProductPage.checkIfTheTotalPriceIsCorrect(ProductPage.java:20) at stepDefinition.Steps.shouldCheckIfTheTotalPriceIsCorrect(Steps.java:143) at ✽.Then I check if Total price with shipping is correct(checkItemPriceFeature.feature:10)
